description: test_authors_up_to_date in test_misc.py passes silently if the first if statement is not True. This happens if you are not using bzr directly. It should probably have an else that at least raises or an assert that fails.
title: test_authors_up_to_date passes when if statement not met

comments.content: test_authors_up_to_date in test_misc.py passes silently if the first if statement is not True. This happens if you are not using bzr directly. It should probably have an else that at least raises or an assert that fails.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jason-koelker
